reports.title: Automation Metrics Summary
reports.last_activity: Date of the last registered activity
reports.paused_description: Pst! From the edit view you can only modify the content of the Emails in your flow and the values for the Wait times. Once you've made the necessary adjustments, restart your Automation.
reports.stopped_description_one: Pst! When reactivating your Automation, it will start from the top, as if it were the first time you activate it.
reports.stopped_description_two: You can download a Report on your Campaign performance from the Download Center.

pause_modal.title: Pause Automation
pause_modal.description_one: While your Campaign is paused, new Subscribers can't enter to the flow
pause_modal.description_two: When you restart your Automation, it will resume for those Subscribers who were in the flow, no matter how much time has passed.
pause_modal.description_three: You only can modify elements as Emails and Wait times.
pause_modal.description_four: Are you sure you want to pause it?

stop_modal.title: Stop Automation
stop_modal.description_one: The Subscribers will NOT continue their path through the flow.
stop_modal.description_two: You can download a Report on your Campaign performance.
stop_modal.description_three: IMPORTANT: If you reactivate the Campaign, it will start from the top, as if it were the first time you activate it.
stop_modal.description_four: Are you sure you want to stop it?

pause_confirmation_modal.title: Once you've made the necessary adjustments, restart your Automation
pause_confirmation_modal.description: From the edit view you can only modify the content of the Emails in your flow and the values for the Wait times.

no_dynamic_element_modal.title: WARNING
no_dynamic_element_modal.description_abandoned_cart: You are about to start this Automation without showing elements of your users' Abandoned Cart in any Email.
no_dynamic_element_modal.description_visited_products: You are about to start this Automation without showing elements of Products Visited by your users in any Email.
no_dynamic_element_modal.description_pending_order: Your Email doesn‚Äôt have the Order Detail element, so the information about products with pending payments won‚Äôt be shown. Any doubt? Go to HELP.
no_dynamic_element_modal.description_confirmation_order: Your Email doesn‚Äôt have the Order Detail element, so the information about products won‚Äôt be shown. Any doubt? Go to HELP.

info.description3: Schedule shipments to greet your contacts on their birthday or remind your clients about their payments dues.

info.description5: Program a flow to trigger Emails or actions taking into account the interaction between your Subscribers and your shipments.

info.description6: Program Emails customized according to the interactions that users have had with your website and convert them into customers.

info.description7: Schedule a series of Emails to encourage the users who left items in their cart to complete their purchase.

info.repeated_message_for_unique_available_in: You already have an Automation flow associated with your store.

automation_task_header.title: Define your Automation Campaign Type
automation_task_header.description: You have different ways to create your Automation Campaigns. You can either choose to generate one or many sendings inside the same Campaign.
automation_task_header.tip: Take advantage of the different Automation Campaigns and choose which one to use based on your goals. Plan a sending flow and activate it.

modal_trial.title: Try On-Site Tracking Automation for FREE
modal_trial.description: Target users based on their behavior on your website or E-commerce. Thanks to this feature you can send automatic and 100% personalized Emails to the users who visit a specific page. For example, you can send a discount to users who view a particular product page.
modal_trial.title2: When does the free trial end?
modal_trial.description2: Our goal is that you can see how to use this feature in your business and check its benefits, so for the moment you can use it with no restrictions.
modal_trial.title3: What will happen to the Automations created when the free trial ends?
modal_trial.description3: They'll remain inactive, and you won't be able to edit them until you hire the special module which includes this service.

modal_domains.title: You almost got it! To start using On-Site Tracking Automation first you need to add your domain
modal_domains.description: From the Control Panel you can add and verify your Website domain. It's too easy! We also explain to you the process step by step in a Help Center tutorial.
modal_domains.title2: Why is it necessary for you to add and verify your domain?
modal_domains.description2: Doing that, we can track the pages you determine from your Automation Campaigns.

modal_blocked_lists.title:
Ouch! This Automation has blocked
Lists and/or blocked Segments
modal_blocked_lists.description: To start it, we suggest to clean your Lists and delete Subscribers that affect its quality. You can also revert the last Subscribers' import you have made in a blocked List. Any doubt? Take a look at our HELP.
